results.title: Simvastatin could prevent increase of the serum MMP-9/TIMP-1 ratio in acute ischaemic stroke.
results.text_hl: These findings indicate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ given during 24 hours after the onset of @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ could have an influence on the @GENE_MMP9 @GENE_4318 @@@MMP-9@@@/@GENE_TIMP1 @GENE_7076 @@@TIMP-1@@@ ratio during @<m>DISEASE_Androgen_Insensitivity_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013734 @@@AIS@@@.

citations.NLM: Kurzepa J, Szczepanska-Szerej A, Stryjecka-Zimmer M, Malecka-Massalska T, Stelmasiak Z. Simvastatin could prevent increase of the serum MMP-9/TIMP-1 ratio in acute ischaemic stroke. Folia Biol (Praha). 2006;52(6):181-3. PMID: 17184595
